title: I have a watercolor af a portrait of Albert Einstein done by A Carlos Hidalgo which he gave to me as a gift In Rome Italy in either 1968 or 69. I would like to have it appraised but it has been in a shipping tube since it was given to me.  Do you think it has deteriorated and should I have a professional remove it as I am thinking of having it framed and appraised.  I greatly appreciate any help or suggestions you may give me. Thank you very much
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  You might ask some of these people about removing the artwork from the tube. http://www.myreporter.com/2013/08/where-is-the-best-place-to-get-a-piece-of-artwork-appraised-in-the-greater-wilmington-area/
